T71C 99899478 153641
A TABLE OF EXCISE FOR Strong BEER and ALE FOR VICTUALLERS, At 3 s. 3 d. the Barrel, From One, to Five Thousand: IN WHICH, The ADDITIONAL is separate from the other DUTY. The First Column is, The Duty with the Additional. The Second is, The Duty without the Additional. The Third is, The Additional Duty only. Published by ORDER of the GRAND COMMISSIONERS of EXCISE. LONDON, Printed by Eliz. Holt, 1690.
The Duty of EXCISE for Strong BEER and ALE, for VICTƲALLERS. The Duty with the Additional. Without the Additional. The Addi∣tional only.
